reviewText: so disappointed
First, It is only for Chinese people. Second, I think it is too much talk and a few lessons.
poor quality and even worse presentation by the teacher
it's a well-taught teacher but the bilingual statement way waste too much time.

I have some suggestions: 1. Use consistent English throughout the course due to this is an English class. 2. one "upload"  button is enough in the assignment . . . so it doesn't confuse people 3. Specify the minimum grade to pass the assignment if it 80%, then say 80% . . . However, overall the course is good, and I love learning other culture! Kind of a new experience for me. Thank you very much! ^_^ Xie Xie . . .
The course is good but it has too much Chinese, and I'm not Chinese.

I would expect less mistakes in english. It would make a better impression.The course content was well-thought and well-balanced, the professor had a great way of presenting the material, but the english language part needed some editing.
老师讲得不错，美中不足是开头部分比较长。

It's amazing course, although it will be better, if he speaks only in English or use English subtitles when he explains in Chinese.
English speeches plays an important role in the workplace, I've acquired the necessary skills for an attractive speeches, this help a lot in my work. Thanks teacher for developing such a good lesson.

Great course and Hongyan is a perfect lector. All information good structured with valuable examples. Most part of course in international English - with a minor sentence in Chinese. One con - had to wait to check my submissions.

That's an amazing course for us Chinese students to improve English speaking skills. It's not only about pronunciation and intonation, but also teach us how to use global perspective.
